name: Seas The Day
description:
Explore a variety of islands to get all the magic sparkles scattered around. Craft bigger and better boats and upgrade your tools. The choice is yours, so why not Seas the Day?

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Escape to open and close the crafting menu
  • X or click to use an equipped item (axe to chop trees, pickaxe to mine)
